name: ProjectXtairs - Alpha
description:
At the time of the first Alpha release to the public this game is a project to experiment and learn about Godot 3 with 3D graphics.

All of the game has been made from scratch, started about 5 weeks before the launch on 28th of october, 2021.

This game is also a part of a bigger project.

# Game created by @xcran

Credits:

- Font: Monogram by datagoblin

More to come in the future...
